title: Dow Movers: TRV, AAPL - Nasdaq.com
text: In early trading on Wednesday, shares of Apple topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.7%. Year to date, Apple registers a 39.8% gain.    makeArticleAd();  And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Travelers Companies, trading down 1.0%. Travelers Companies is showing a gain of 21.2% looking at the year to date performance.      Two other components making moves today are Nike, trading down 1.0%, and Cisco Systems, trading up 1.5% on the day.        VIDEO: Dow Movers: TRV, AAPL
